cowrat.recoled.client
Class IncompleteLineBorder

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.border.AbstractBorder
      cowrat.recoled.client.IncompleteLineBorder
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.border.Border, java.io.Serializable
public class IncompleteLineBorder
extends javax.swing.border.AbstractBorder

A class which implements a line border of arbitrary thickness and of a single color.

Warning: Serialized objects of this class will not be compatible with future Swing releases. The current serialization support is appropriate for short term storage or RMI between applications running the same version of Swing. As of 1.4, support for long term storage of all JavaBeansTM has been added to the java.beans package. Please see java.beans.XMLEncoder.

See Also:
